mapper.select: select aa.* from (SELECT @rownum:=0) temp, (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, b.* FROM board b where deleteYn ='N' and title like concat(concat('%',#{searchKey}),'%') and category like concat(concat('%',#{category}),'%') order by id desc) aa where aa.rnum between #{strSno} and #{strEno}
select count(*) from board where deleteYn ='N' and title like concat(concat('%',#{searchKey}),'%') and category like concat(concat('%',#{category}),'%')
mapper.update: update board set deleteYn = 'Y' where id = #{id}
